segments.text: Excuse me . Have you forgotten our drinks ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry , I'll bring them to you right away .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why is it taking so long ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We are short of staff today .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There is something wrong with this dish .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't think this is fresh .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you please ask the manager to come over ?
segments.speaker: S1
